nihal pi.abesinhame wasare mul masa haya athulatha sancharaka wyaparayen labu aadayama pasugiya wasare mul masa pahata wada siyayata 34kin wadiwi athayi aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya pawasayi.ee anuwa me wasare mul masa paha athulatha in labu aadayama amerikan dolar miliyana 815ki.emenma me wasare mul masa paha athulatha shri lankawata pamini sancharakayange sankhyawa siyayata 26.5kin wadiwi athayi aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya pawasayi.ee anuwa 2014 wasare mul masa haya athulatha merata pamina athi sancharakayange sankhyawa 624178ki.

pragdhana himiyan kerehi palakayan thula wu mema thakkadi aadaraya podu janaya kerehi nowu athara uthura kerehi wenas kota salakime prathipaththiyak digin digatama pawathwa ganna ladi.uthura sambandhawa rajapaksha rajaye debidi prathipaththiyak wiya yanna kisidu witeka prathikshepa kala nohaki sathyaya karunaki.ban ki munge warthawa lankawe swairibhawaya kerehi wana agiligasimak nam ema agili gasima sadaha ida,awakashaya saha awasthawa salasa denu labuwe palakayange thakkadikama wisini.aduma tharamin yuda kalayata pasu dayan jayathilaka jiniwahidi lokaya wetha idiripath kala porondu yojanawaliya ho kriyawata nanwi nam mita wada yahapath thathwayak apeksha kala hakiwa thibuni.al jasira badu athyanthayenma amerikanu wirodhi madhya pawa me wanawita sitinuye munge warthawata pakshapathi sthawarayakaya.purawasiyange ayithin pagadamamin jathyanthara agili gasim sadaha awakashaya wiwara kota dunne rajapaksha rejimayama misa an kawareku ho nowe.swairibhawaya anathure helanawa yayi palakayan munta agilla digu karaddi agili hatharak owun wetha ella wi thibe.ema agili hathare shapayen galawi yamata owunta kisiwiteka idak natha.eksath jathinge debidibhawaya tharamatama rajapaksha rejimaye mema debidibhawayada pilikul sahagathaya.ajuwaya.
